title: Health check monitor
content:
resource "cloudflare_load_balancer_monitor" "health_check" {
  account_id     = var.account_id
  expected_body = "alive"
  expected_codes = "2xx"
  method         = "GET"
  timeout        = 5
  path           = "/health"
  interval       = 60
  retries        = 2
  description    = "Health check for www origins"
  type           = "https"

header = {
    Host = ["${var.domain}"]
  }
}
